title: Apache Ignite Web Console Demo
message: Apache Ignite Console in Demo mode starts as a three-node cluster inside the ignite-web-agent. Click on:
• Configuration to checkout several predefined clusters, caches, domain models and IGFS.
• SQL to run various SQL queries on the demo database, and view the data in a tabular form and as charts.
In order to try Apache Ignite Console in Demo mode, you need to:
